name: Bella Italia
description: Authentic Italian cuisine with a cozy atmosphere. Enjoy traditional dishes made from fresh ingredients in a charming setting.

name: Little Shucker
description: Fresh seafood and oysters in a casual setting. Experience the finest selection of shellfish paired with refreshing drinks.

name: Marafuku Ramen
description: Authentic Japanese ramen with rich broth. Each bowl is crafted with slow-cooked broth and hand-pulled noodles.

name: Bottega
description: Fine Italian dining with handmade pasta. A perfect spot to savor gourmet meals with an extensive wine selection.

name: Arabia Nights
description: Traditional Middle Eastern cuisine with live music. Enjoy aromatic spices and authentic dishes in a lively setting.

name: Lokma
description: Delicious Turkish street food and desserts. Indulge in rich flavors, from kebabs to sweet baklava treats.

name: The Snug
description: A cozy pub with a selection of craft beers and comfort food. The warm ambiance makes it a great spot to unwind with friends.

name: Starbelly
description: Modern bistro with fusion dishes and cocktails. A trendy eatery known for its unique flavors and stylish decor.

name: Iori
description: Japanese fine dining with sushi and kaiseki dishes. Immerse yourself in an elegant setting with expertly prepared cuisine.

name: Ngalley
description: African-inspired cuisine with bold flavors and spices. Experience a mix of traditional and contemporary dishes from across the continent.

name: Diagonal
description: Contemporary European cuisine with a modern twist. A refined menu featuring innovative dishes and fresh ingredients.

name: Kitoko
description: Fusion of Asian and Latin American flavors. A vibrant culinary journey combining the best of both worlds.

name: Bottega Prime
description: A high-end Italian eatery specializing in handcrafted pasta and premium wines. Experience the true taste of Italy in an elegant ambiance.

name: Bottega Elite
description: Exclusive gourmet dining with a focus on fresh, local ingredients. A sophisticated setting for those who appreciate fine cuisine.

name: Bottega Royale
description: A luxurious Italian restaurant offering an exquisite menu. From truffle-infused dishes to the finest wines, indulge in culinary perfection.

name: Bottega Grand
description: A charming eatery combining traditional Italian recipes with modern twists. Experience bold flavors in a warm and inviting atmosphere.
